<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surging Might](/Feats.aspx?ID=6068) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104) (Level 10)

</column>

---

You focus the power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances. If the next action you use is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734), the spell ignores an amount of the target's resistance equal to your level against the following types of damage: [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509), and [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510). This applies to all damage the spell deals, including [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell. This doesn't cause the spell to ignore immunities, only resistances.
name: Surging Might
